test-method.name: getAllDepartmentsTest
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to Get All Departments 2. Validate that all the counter IDs are unique. 3. Verify the response status code is 200.

test-method.name: getAllItemsTest
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to Get All Items 2. Validate that the Item Id and Item name are not null. 3. Verify the response status code is 200.

test-method.name: getIncentiveSummaryTest
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to Incentive Summary Report 2. Validate that the Prescriber Id and Prescriber name are not null. 3. Verify the response status code is 200.

test-method.name: getIncentiveReffSummaryTest
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to Incentive Referral Summary Report 2. Validate that the Prescriber name, PrescriberId, DocTotalAmount, TDSAmount and NetPayableAmount are not null. 3. Verify the response status code is 200.

test-method.name: getHospitalIncomeIncReportTest
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to Hospital Income Incentive Report 2. Validate that the ServiceDepartmentName, ServiceDepartmentId, NetSales, ReferralCommission, GrossIncome, OtherIncentive and HospitalNetIncome are not null. 3. Verify the response status code is 200.

test-method.name: getIncenEmpBillItemsTest
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to Incentive Employee Bill Items 2. Validate that the EmployeeIncentiveInfoId, EmployeeId, FullName, TDSPercent, EmpTDSPercent, IsActive are not null. 3. Verify the response status code is 200.

test-method.name: getInventoryFiscalYearsTest
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to Inventory Fiscal Years 2. Validate that the FiscalYearId, FiscalYearName are not null. 3. Verify the response status code is 200.

test-method.name: activateInventoryTest
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to Activate Inventory 2. Validate that the StoreId, Name, and StoreDescription are not null. 3. Verify the response status code is 200.

test-method.name: inventorySubCategoryTest
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to Inventory Subcategory 2. Validate that the SubCategoryName and SubCategoryId are not null. 3. Verify the response status code is 200.

test-method.name: availableItemsTest
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to available Items by Store Id 2. Validate that the ItemId, AvailableQuantity and StoreId are not null. 3. Verify the response status code is 200.

test-method.name: validateReferrersFromEmployeeSettingsTest
test-method.description: 1. Send GET request to fetch the list of doctors. 2. Verify the response status code is 200. 3. Validate the response contains 'Status' as 'OK'. 4. Ensure EmployeeId exists and is unique for each record in the response.

test-method.name: validateLabBillCfgItemsByDepartmentNameTest
test-method.description: 1. Send GET request to fetch the list of service items. 2. Verify the response status code is 200. 3. Validate the response contains 'Status' as 'OK'. 4. Ensure BillItemPriceId and ServiceDepartmentId exist in the response.

test-method.name: validatePatientCurrentVisitContextByPatientIdAndVisitIdTest
test-method.description: 1. Send GET request to fetch patient visit details. 2. Verify the response status code is 200. 3. Validate the response contains 'Status' as 'OK'. 4. Ensure PatientId, PatientVisitId, PerformerId, and VisitDate are not null.

test-method.name: validatePatientBillingContextByPatientIdTest
test-method.description: 1. Send GET request to fetch patient billing details. 2. Verify the response status code is 200. 3. Validate the response contains 'Status' as 'OK'. 4. Ensure PatientId matches the provided parameter.

test-method.name: validatePatientNotes
test-method.description: 1. Retrieve the patient ID by searching the patient Devid8 Roy8. 2. Use the patient ID to fetch the patient's clinical notes. 3. Validate the response status code, status, and key fields in the results.

test-method.name: validateAdmittedPatientsData
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to fetch admitted patients data. 2. Validate that all required fields in the response are not null. 3. Verify the response status code is 200 and the status is 'OK'. 4. Validate the 'Action' field in the BedInformation object is 'Admission'.
